Perceptor::

"I don't say, master" replied Perceptor "to do it while Flicker is 
with Maximals... we can try to do it in a battle with them; altough 
the second in command is a nice target, every maximal could be 
useful... those idiots trust their secrets each others"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron / Switchblade --
> 
> Megatron ignores Flicker as he leaves. He continues walking, 
> Perceptor tailing behind. "Hmm, right no, Flicker is going to get 
> data. Trying to capture the Maximal's second in command would blow 
> his cover, thus defeating the purpose of him going over there."
> 
> Megatron says nothing more as he leaps out of the Predacon 
> base, "BEAST MODE!" He yells and he transforms into his dragon 
form, 
> and begins the job of catching up to the rest of the Predacons.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > "I just will suggest, master"said Perceptor while he followed 
> > him"that Flincker find out who's close to Maximal Leader... if we 
> > able to capture him or her, we can get very important data... "
> >
